required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Study of MT-2766 in Japanese Adults（COVID-19）
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I/II, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study to Evaluate the Safety and Immunogenicity of MT-2766 in Japanese Adults (COVID-19)

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of MT-2766 in Japanese adults.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
study_design_info.masking_description: MT-2766 High dose group and placebo group are randomized and observer-blinded. MT-2766 Low dose group is open label.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidences, severity, and investigator-assessed causality of immediate adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 30 minutes of first (Day 0) and second (Day 21) injections

primary_outcome.measure: The incidences and severity of the following solicited AEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: 7 days of first (Day 0) and second (Day 21) injections
primary_outcome.description: (i) local AEs (injection site erythema, injection site swelling, injection site induration, and injection site pain) and (ii) systemic AEs (fever, headache, fatigue, muscle aches, joint aches, chills, a feeling of general discomfort, swelling in the axilla, and swelling in the neck)．

primary_outcome.measure: The incidences, severity, and investigator-assessed causality of unsolicited AEs
primary_outcome.time_frame: 21 days of first (Day 0) and second (Day 21) injections

primary_outcome.measure: The incidences of serious AEs (SAEs), medically attended AEs (MAAEs), AEs leading to withdrawal, AEs of special interest (AESIs), and deaths
primary_outcome.time_frame: 21 days following first (Day 0) and second (Day 21) injections
primary_outcome.description: AESIs include vaccine-associated enhanced diseases (VAED), hypersensitivity reactions, and potential immune-mediated diseases (pIMDs)
geometric mean antibody titer (GMT), seroconversion (SC) rate, and geometric mean fold rise (GMFR)

primary_outcome.measure: SARS-CoV-2-specific T helper 1 (Th1) cell-mediated immune (CMI) responses
primary_outcome.description: using the interferon (IFN)-γ enzyme-linked immunospot (ELISpot) assay

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidences of SAEs, MAAEs, AEs leading to withdrawal, AESIs, and deaths
The incidences of SAEs, MAAEs, AEs leading to withdrawal, AESIs, and deaths
The numbers and percentages of subjects with normal and abnormal urine, hematological, and biochemical test results
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 days of first (Day 0) and second (Day 21) injections

secondary_outcome.description: based on the total immunoglobulin G (IgG) level, and the persistence of these antibodies will be analyzed

intervention.description: Subjects will receive two doses of MT-2766 high dose given 21 days apart into the deltoid region of the alternating arm (each arm will be injected once)
Subjects will receive two doses of placebo given 21 days apart into the deltoid region of the alternating arm (each arm will be injected once)
Subjects will receive two doses of MT-2766 low dose given 21 days apart into the deltoid region of the alternating arm (each arm will be injected once)

overall_contact.last_name: Clinical Trials Information Desk, to prevent miscommunication,
